title: Roasted pork fillet with chorizo and pepper sauce
description: Inspired by a trip to Spain, James Martin uses woodfire-roasted red peppers to flavour a smoky sauce for pork fillet.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
200g/7oz semi-cured chorizo, peeled and finely chopped
200ml/7fl oz veal jus or reduced beef or veal stock, warmed
